availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky. Kentucky native. Married to Madison B. Ireland in Henry County, Kentucky, on November 5, 1850. Mother of Cragg M. Ireland, George T. Ireland, Virginia "Jennie" Anna Ireland, Ida Ireland, and Richard "Dixie" Ireland. Resident of Henry County in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1850. Household owned Minerva [Unknown] in Henry County in 1853. Resident of Henry County in 1860. Household owned two enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.
